channel.title: Playing From the Same House
channel.description: So me and my brother like to tag-team and code servers, and we still yet to figure out how to play together from the same house off two different computers. If anyone can help me it would be greatly appreciated.

item.title: Playing From the Same House
item.dc:creator: @_Haste1 #Haste
item.description:
@_Haste1 wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:2, topic:393841”]This could be several items.

  1. Make sure the server allows more than one connection from same ip
  2. Make sure you are ported
  3. You can test porting at canyouseeme.org[/quote]

Read full topic
